subject: Re: [junit] German book on Junit and test first ready for review
msgSnippet: ... In the world of languages, there is English and there is also French, German, Hindi...  Several books already exist in English so one in German cannot arm.
messageBody:
> Give ur book on english version.

In the world of languages, there is English and there is also French, German, Hindi... Several books already exist in English so one in German cannot arm.

No offense, just Friday afternoon :-)

-Vladimir
